transcript_en: Hello? Hello? Ha hello? Uh hi sir very good afternoon sir how are you? Kaise hai aap? Uh good I'm fine I'm fine how are you? Uh badhiya hai sir Hindi ya English? Uh aap Mr. Raj baat kar rahe hai right? Ha ha ha chaliye chaliye boliye boliye sir boliye suniye jaldi boliye Mr. Raj kya hua sir? Sorry hai kya? Mera naam Prashant hai. Uh my name is Prashant I'm calling from IndiaMART head office senior manager. Okay. Actually uh you must be aware about IndiaMART services right? You had a discussion with Anju and everything. So Anju uh came to me and she was having some uh offers right? Regarding TrustSeal services. So uh you may about to decide that services right? In which we will increase your leads. Enquiries, calls and everything and we will be representing you as a trusted supplier of IndiaMART right? So but right now we will not be going for that I told them also right now we will not because we invest made a lot of huge investment on uh our machinery and things like that. And uh actually there were some offers also. So that's the reason I thought like you know we'll wait for some time and maybe on someday we'll go for this. So that's what I thought about. So we'll take some time for this. When we will uh plan for this? Maybe uh give us some time maybe uh next year by February March let's see if business goes good and uh let's work on I'll get easier we'll definitely go for this. But not at this time. We talked about this also we spoke to my partners also so even those do the same thing. You see we'll go for a while. Okay uh just one thing sir. Uh one more thing I would like to discuss. We have received a call from your side today in the morning. Okay. Is there any issues? Is there any issues you're facing regarding services? See sir actually the number is in Mysore. I am in Bangalore. The main person who's taking care of this is in Mysore. Maybe she's called for some reason. This Nivedita. call number actually today. Oh is it? Yes. Oh I need to check it sir because what kind of specific about this. Uh if you hold this call can I just connect with her? So just wanted to know what is that issues which you're facing so that we can resolve it right? Yeah yeah. So uh is there any kind of issues you are facing related to services or any other thing? No that is what sir as I said it is uh I'll just check and I'll get back to you sir. I'll get back. Okay I'll be waiting for the call please talk to your representative and call back okay thank you. Yeah thank you thank you.

issues.problem: Seller is not interested in TrustSEAL due to recent investments.
issues.actionable_summary: Note the seller's timeline (February/March next year) for potential future interest in TrustSEAL and follow up then.

issues.problem: Seller's representative may have called with an issue, but the seller is unaware of the details.
issues.actionable_summary: The IndiaMART representative should follow up with the seller's representative (Nivedita) to determine the nature of the issue and resolve it.

upsell.upsell_reason: Seller expressed potential future interest in TrustSEAL.

call_summary: An IndiaMART representative called the seller, Mr. Raj, to follow up on a previous discussion about TrustSEAL services. Mr. Raj stated that he is not interested in TrustSEAL at the moment due to recent investments in machinery but might consider it later. The representative also inquired about a call made by the seller earlier that day to address any potential issues.

key_insights: Seller is not currently interested in TrustSEAL due to recent investments.
There may be an unresolved issue that the seller's representative contacted IndiaMART about.
